author: geekship
title: SOIL: Regional education
description: 电子商务在拉丁美洲的许多地区仍在发展中

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement being E-commerce still growing in Latin America the proposer wants to promote their ecommerce platform to encourage entrepreneurship and ADA recognition. The proposer hasn't provided much information on how this will help to tackle the challenge. therefore this proposal doesn't addresses the problem
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has mentioned that they have 10 years experience has a software developer but if they had provided any past experience on similar projects this would have helped a lot. The proposal doesn't consist of any plan and they have already applied for another proposal in "Accelerate Decentralized Identity" so this proposal won't be implemented
f6_assessments.q2: No details regarding timeline and budget breakdown have been provided. Also no plans have been given and also no definition of success for 3, 6 and 12 months have been give so with the information provided we won't be able to track the growth and success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Great Concept to use a proposal to reach out to others for possible collaboration.  Please next time you can use the WITHDRAWN key words in the tittle if you want withdraw it after all your consideration to help the CA. I would also suggest , you can rework on the Proposal and submit in the next funds.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has experience that will makeup a team to implement this proposal but unfortunately , He did not have enough time to work on the proposal, I think He can do better in the next fund. I would suggest spend time reading the guideline and past funded proposal to see how you can bring this great idea back.
f6_assessments.q2: The fund requested is too small for a successfully  proposal implementation but I understand the Proposer did not focus his effort on this proposal, so Next fund He can handle the audit-ability well.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is for an experiment to radically change the existing IP enforcement methodology. The scheme of thinks and the outline is very promising and there is a strong reason to support this line of work. In order to support IP, there is a need for strong Law enforcement support to implement the contracts. Blockchain can play a disruptive role with a smart contract-based incentive scheme for the inventor. However, the current state of the art is too pedestrian to implement such ideas.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has about 15 years experiance and he has made this proposal to attract like minds in discussing and taking this bold idea forward. I feel the proposal should be supported at the cost of $42 to encourage the proposer further to work on this brilliant idea.
f6_assessments.q2: The amount requested is $42. If a core group of interested party is formed and carryout some further analysis on how to implement the idea it can be of great help to the community.

f6_assessments.q0:
Leverage SOIL's e-commerce platform to promote entrepreneurship and Cardano recognition in Latin America. The problem described makes sense and is within the scope of this challenge.
The challenge is possible but the explanations of how it will be done, the resources needed or how they will be applied.
f6_assessments.q1: The proponent did not have time to elaborate on this proposal, which is primarily intended to reach out to others interested in the domain. Therefore, there is not enough information to assess the feasibility of the proposal. I think the problem is quite interesting, so the proponent can return to the fund later with more complete content.
f6_assessments.q2: With that said, the proponent raised the issue to gauge people's interest in the proposal, not a complete proposal, it's just an idea. Therefore, no roadmap with milestones, no KPIs, and a given budget of $42 is symbolic. Therefore, there is no basis to evaluate the success of the project

solution: 推广SOIL电子商务平台，以促进企业家精神和Cardano的认可。
experience:
软件开发人员超过10年，最近5年专注于前端。
